Class ServiceCollectionExtensions

Extension methods for IServiceCollection to register services related to bot strings and configuration.

AddBotStringsServices(IServiceCollection, int)

Adds services for bot strings based on the specified number of shards.

Declaration
public static IServiceCollection AddBotStringsServices(this IServiceCollection services, int shardCount)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IServiceCollection services

The collection of services.
int shardCount

The number of shards.
Returns
Type Description
IServiceCollection

The modified collection of services.

AddConfigServices(IServiceCollection)

Adds configuration services by scanning for sealed subclasses of ConfigServiceBase<TSettings> in the calling assembly.

AddSealedSubclassesOf(IServiceCollection, Type)
